documentation.text:
Needed to calculate the Exchange Market Index
 Total Exchange Market Value = sum of each offering market value [getMarketValue()]
 Exchange Market Index = sum of the product of the offering price and offering merket weigth

getMarketValue().notice: Needed to calculate the Exchange Market Index Total Exchange Market Value = sum of each offering market value [getMarketValue()] Exchange Market Index = sum of the product of the offering price and offering merket weigth
